application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required by Condition 3 (Construction Traffic Management Plan) of planning permission PP/21/06733 (Reconfiguration of Nos 51-52 to provide residential flats (Class C3), and creation of additional floorspace via extensions, basement and efficient space planning. Retention of whole facade of No 51 and rebuilding of concrete bay, modern upper floor and gothic gable of No 52 with ground floor of No 52 being retained; installation of roof to Nos 51 and 52; dormer to rear slope of mansard roof extension to Nos 51 and 52; creation of additional volume at rear of 51 and 52 through increase in height of third and fourth floors; creation of extension to fourth floor at rear of No. 51; provision of enlarged and redesigned courtyard / glazed lightwell in centre of site; reconstruction of chimney stacks and party wall; creation of roof terraces to rear at third and fourth floor levels across both properties)
